Race¶

Provides a framework to load and store data on races and race editions.

class first_cycling_api.race.Race(race_id)¶

A wrapper class to load and store information on races.

ID¶

The firstcycling.com ID for the race, as seen in the URL of the race page.

Type

int

header_details¶

A dictionary listing information from the header of race pages.

Type

dict

edition_years¶

A list of the years in which race editions took place.

Type

list of int

editions¶

The race editions for each year.

Type

dict {int: RaceEdition}

overview¶

The race editions for each year.

Type

dict {int: RaceOverview}

get_edition_information(year)¶

Get race edition information.

Parameters

year (int) – Year for which to obtain edition information.

Returns

Return type

RaceEditionInformation

get_edition_results(year, classification_num=None, stage_num=None)¶

Get race edition results for given classification or stage.

Parameters

  • year (int) – Year for which to obtain edition information.

  • classification_num (int) – Classification for which to collect information. See utilities.Classifications for possible inputs.

  • stage_num (int) – Stage number for which to collect results, if applicable. Input 0 for prologue.

Returns

Return type

RaceEditionResults

get_edition_stage_profiles(year)¶

Get race edition stage profiles.

Parameters

year (int) – Year for which to obtain edition information.

Returns

Return type

RaceEditionStageProfiles

get_edition_startlist_extended(year)¶

Get race edition startlist in extended mode.

Parameters

year (int) – Year for which to obtain edition information.

Returns

Return type

RaceEditionStartlistExtended

get_edition_startlist_normal(year)¶

Get race edition startlist in normal mode.

Parameters

year (int) – Year for which to obtain edition information.

Returns

Return type

RaceEditionStartlistNormal

get_overview(classification)¶

Get race overview for given classifications.

Parameters

classification (int) – Classification for which to collect information. See utilities.Classifications for possible inputs.

Returns

Return type

RaceOverview

get_overviews(classifications=[0])¶

Get race overview for given classifications.

Parameters

classifications (list of int, default [0]) – List of classifications for which to collect information. See utilities.Classifications for possible numbers.

Returns

results – Overviews for selected classifications.

Return type

dict {int: RaceOverview}

get_stage_victories()¶

Get race all-time stage victories.

Returns

Return type

RaceStageVictories

get_victory_table()¶

Get race all-time victory table.

Returns

Return type

RaceVictoryTable

get_year_by_year(classification)¶

Get year-by-year race statistics for given classification.

Parameters

classification (int) – Classification for which to collect information. See utilities.Classifications for possible inputs.

Returns

Return type

RaceOverview

get_year_by_years(classifications=[0])¶

Get year-by-year race statistics for given classifications.

Parameters

classifications (list of int, default [0]) – List of classifications for which to collect information. See utilities.Classifications for possible numbers.

Returns

results – Overviews for selected classifications.

Return type

dict {int: RaceOverview}

get_youngest_oldest_winners()¶

Get race all-time victory table.

Returns

Return type

RaceYoungestOldestWinners

class first_cycling_api.race.RaceEdition(race_id, year)¶
class first_cycling_api.race.RaceEditionInformation(params)¶

Extends Endpoint.

class first_cycling_api.race.RaceEditionResults(params)¶

An endpoint for a race edition’s results. Extends ParsedEndpoint.

results_table¶

A DataFrame containing the victory table.

Type

pd.DataFrame

standings¶

For stage races, maps classification names to a DataFrame with the appropriate standings after the stage.

Type

dict {str : pd.DataFrame}

Extends Endpoint.

class first_cycling_api.race.RaceStageVictories(params)¶

An endpoint for a race’s stage victories table. Extends ParsedEndpoint.

table¶

A DataFrame containing the victory table.

Type

pd.DataFrame

class first_cycling_api.race.RaceVictoryTable(params)¶

An endpoint for a race’s victory table. Extends ParsedEndpoint.

table¶

A DataFrame containing the victory table.

Type

pd.DataFrame
